title: Niyathi
overview: When the private detective cheziyan held up with a problem, he try to find the solution for the problem which reveals another problem happened in the past

title: Neo Blood X
overview: A new group of thugs in town have a hit list to carry out, their main targets are rapists, human traffickers and pedophiles.

title: Dragon Cop
overview: Hong Kong Police Detectives Dragon Yuen and Cynthia Chan are about to bust a drug case involving Mr Chow's triad and American criminal John Rickman. But they will be trapped by Chow's men and will have no choice but to fight to stay alive.  But Dragon and Cynthia will make a very strange discovery...

title: Botswana
overview: A lawyer rehearses the defense of a criminal with unconventional methods. The alleged criminal cannot trust even his own judgement.

title: Broken Heart
overview: Mandy, a true crime enthusiast, goes through a breakup and suspects a pizza delivery driver may be a serial killer.

title: Chitram Choodara
overview: When the manager of Srinivasa Creations' production office visits a town to look for locations, he meets some artists and asks them to come to Hyderabad. What will happen next?

title: A Killer In Love
overview: After having killed someone, hit-man Thomas runs into the most beautiful woman he's ever met and completely falls in love.  What he doesn't know yet, she is the wife of the guy he has just killed.
tagline: He has seen a lot of blood, but he never tasted true love

title: The Spice Machine
overview: Henry (lammdunk) must go on a Spice Journey to become the Spice Machine, defeat the Reaper, and restore the Spice Balance of the world.

title: Tandem, P.I.
overview: Two new P.I.s struggling to find their first case are forced into a game of Cat and Mouse when their bike is stolen, giving them the opportunity to prove their ability to not only the city, but themselves.

title: FREEDOM MAN: THE BALLAD OF THE BRICK
overview: FREEDOM MAN™ and his sidekick Willy Wigger are looking for the missing brick in G2

title: A Toast to the Host
overview: When a birthday dinner takes a murderous turn, it's up to the surviving guests to figure out who killed the host and why? Not to mention having to keep themselves alive too.

title: Kaaval The Movie
overview: Based on the police drama series Kaaval which aired four seasons on TV2 (2014-2021).  Due to the increasing crime rate in the city, ASP Lawrence and his team Inspector Allena, Inspector Thivya and Inspector Agho work together to catch the criminals and gangs involved. After a long investigation, they are able to identify certain gangs and group leaders involved in drug trafficking and human trafficking. Meanwhile Karthik and Kaviya are college students who are very much in love and Karthik seeks help from his brother Thillai to talk to Kaviya's father for the approval of their relationship. Kaviya's father Barathan is a famous scrap metal business owner but few know about his past. Barathan is very unhappy with Karthik. Lucy and Martin have instead asked their gang members to get young girls kidnapped and to be sold in Thailand.

title: Yusif
overview: Yusif Ibrahim is a university student, who suddenly starts to have a mental illness and live two different lives without knowing which one is the real life. When his brother Firas dies in one of his lives, he becomes an arms dealer and works with his brother to save him in the second one.

title: POND
overview: After a failed bank robbery, a disillusioned thief questions her morality while seeking revenge from her former crime partner.
tagline: Run, even if it means losing everything.

title: Sindacato
overview: Sindacato is the story of an Italian mobster, Tony Fontanza, attempting to escape his boss, Louie. Louie puts him up for one last job, but not everything goes as planned...
tagline: One more and I'm done... for real this time.

title: Bellboy
overview: A hotel bellhop faces a moral dilemma after one day being presented with a large series of cash tips - in exchange for unknowingly becoming the middleman in a crime scheme.

title: Danger of Entrapment
overview: A post on social media reports that eleven black girls have gone missing. The police, the mayor, and the community want to know the truth, causing a special task force to be assembled to investigate the report.
tagline: Everyday people are bought and sold.

title: The Daddy Derek Conspiracy
overview: When filmaker Derek Savage proposes a collaboration between him and Tommy Wiseau, Neil Breen becomes determined to stop them.

title: Shooting Your Own Shadow
overview: A jaded and delusional assassin rethinks some life choices with her manager, while believing she's the main character in a 90s style tv show called, "Shooting Your Own Shadow".

title: Last Fare
overview: On his last night in town, driver Jack Glover’s past catches up with him.

title: Maya Valai
overview: Sharu, a Youtuber obsessed with views and subscribers, orders a "Mystery Box", kicking off a series of eerie events, blending suspense and supernatural intrigue.

title: STRIKER'S GAME
overview: A retired carrom legend faces off against a menacing gangster, using his unmatched skills to safeguard the integrity of the game and secure his lasting legacy in this high-stakes short film!

title: Ghost
overview: A school girl’s ghost approaches cop Byunaa asking for help. Meanwhile, detective Od, who has a history with Buynaa, finds the girl’s body while working on a serial murder. A competition arises between the two to solve the case and find the murderer.

title: Paranormal Unit
overview: Four diverse women come together to solve paranormal crimes. Each brings a unique perspective and personal set of circumstances that drives them to keep moving toward their goals and finding the answers to mysteries within and outside themselves.

title: The Flatbread Fire TV Setup
overview: New TV setup was so good had to log it.

title: Little Boy Lost: An ID Mystery
overview: Jealousy, heartbreak and deceit. When 7-year-old Kyron Horman vanishes, investigators suspect his stepmother had a hand in his disappearance. In this one-hour special, Kyron’s mother searches for answers as the family saga takes many bizarre turns.

title: Norjack
overview: In 1971 a Mystery Man Hijacks a Boeing 727 Aircraft.

title: THE HOWLER
overview: Retired Superhero THE HOWLER Springs back into action after a new villain known as “The Marionette” Threatens to terrorize the city of Havenbrook.

title: The Boyz
overview: A gripping coming-of-age film that follows a group of teenagers as they navigate the challenges of growing up and chasing their dreams in a tough world. As they navigate the complexities of adolescence, the boys find themselves confronted with a variety of obstacles, from family problems and peer pressure to poverty and violence. Some turn to music as a means of expression, others are tempted by the allure of fast money and easy thrills, flirting with a life of crime. But no matter what path they choose, they are united by a deep-seated desire to succeed and find their place in the world.

title: All the Lord's Men
overview: A couple of Los Angeles detectives with no leads investigate nothing.

title: Johnny Galagher, Fading Virtues - Pilot (Part 1)
overview: The beginnings of Johnny Galagher's story.  A retired personal investigator in 1920's New York City is roped into a case that will lead him down a dark path.

title: Blind Confession
overview: C-Moe is Dallas's biggest drug dealer who is on top of the world. He has respect, fear, money, and with his beautiful, but dangerous first lady, they look to take over the world. When a tragic accident happens, he has no choice, but to learn how to live with the help of a hometown nurse.
tagline: A man can not serve two masters.

title: Madeleine McCann: The Case Against Christian B
overview: Mark Williams-Thomas carries out the first active British investigation into Christian B.

title: The Sexual Torture Chamber of Doctor Josefel
overview: The girls just want a weekend away from the "good citizen", but when they find them, there's only one place to practice their perversions!  The Sexual Torture Chamber of Doctor Josefel is a collage project, using various clips from trailers and exploitation films in the public domain available on the archive.org website, with music also in the public domain and/or royalty free.

title: Nightmare of Deception
overview: A former detective, Lloyd Brooks, goes to his weekly therapy appointment, where he describes his repetitive nightmare involving his wife, a man and a tragedy.

title: Suelo con techo
overview: Johnson and Barbara are two hired killers who are tasked with killing each other. What they don't know? They are neighbors and are about to fall in love without even seeing each other's faces.

title: Manhunt: Search for the Cop Killer
overview: In 1982, one murderer terrorized North Yorkshire. The Phantom of the Forest sparked the largest armed manhunt in British policing history after he shot and killed two police officers. But was this elusive cop killer hiding in plain sight?

title: A Distant Memory
overview: Varun's seemingly trivial choices cascade into a haunting symphony of consequences. Faced with a life-changing tragedy, he ventures into the enigmatic realms of time, desperate to rewrite destiny, but destiny has other plans for him.
tagline: Love, loss and the quest for redemption.

title: Channel 7
overview: Howard Laut, an anchor on his local broadcasting news network, finds a particularly successful strategy in creating more media buzz: murdering people.

title: Cadillac: A Mobster Fairy Tale
overview: In the 1960s, after the love of his life leaves him in the dust, a young soldier in Boston's Italian Mafia must decide whether his future will be one of violence and lust, or love and morality.

title: Faces Retais -  O ano da coruja
Artichoke Hourglass
overview: An arms dealer who goes by the name Shoehorn vows to bring an end to the man who killed his wife, Roxy.

title: Neon
overview: Neon follows the lives of young women as they try to make it in the entertainment industry. Through heartache, jealousy, and betrayal, they quickly realize how tumultuous things are behind the scenes.

title: Threads of Desire
overview: A sheep farmer's monotonous life is unsettled after she steals an elegant dress from the town's tailor.

title: Lost in Summer
overview: During summer, after high school, a teenage boy confronting the confusion of his life tries everything he can to find a way out. But he fails, murder included.

title: The Legend Returns 2
overview: In the early years of the Republic of China, Uncle Jiu, with his two apprentices, is involved in a bizarre murder case when a centuries-old blood coffin sinks into the Yellow River.

title: Valse with Emptiness
overview: Another night, Mrs Shrimp faces her demons.

title: We Will Find You
overview: A man haunted by the murder of his brother searches for the whereabouts of his killer.

title: Without Heartbeat
overview: Rain soaked streets and a sun baked evening are the backdrop to this tale of a downtown down-and-out killed in gang violence.

title: Nari Nuhen Tu Ardhanari
overview: A Transgender Person commits repeated murders and becomes most wanted criminal in that area. what is the reason behind all of this? the movie unflods one by one.

title: The Proselyte
overview: A Catholic priest with a dark past wrestles with his faith after he hears a confession from an active serial killer.

title: UNBRIDLED
overview: During the Day of Kamianets-Podilsky, a delegation of the Council of Europe visited the city. In the center of the plot is a hero who came to work on his first day of internship. During the solemn session of the City Council, the session hall and the entire administrative building are seized by a group of terrorists, and among the hostages is the protagonist's sister, who works here as a assistant of the mayor. The hero decides to take control of the situation and rescue the hostages, based on his previous experience of service in the VIII Khmelnytsky Special Purpose Battalion.

title: Soupytime
overview: Mr. Killsalot was desperate, desperate enough to commit the worst crime imaginable. Now he is being hunted by the rigid and well accredited Detective Dook, who will stop at nothing to catch him. In this game of cat and mouse, what lines will be crossed and what secrets will be uncovered?

title: Night-Blooming Cereus
overview: A young Broadway actress becomes a lead star after witnessing a secretive death of the main actor. Withholding the truth from others, she seems to have an acting career better than ever...

title: One Sick Tree
overview: After joining a gang, Micah isn’t sure if he’s cut out for the life of a cold-blooded criminal, but is forced into complications further when his boss does something unexpected.

title: Murder For Beginners
overview: Murder For Beginners is Egyptian Short Film

title: LIMINAL
overview: A troubled man returns home for the last time.

title: Dude With an Uzi
overview: A man finds an uzi in the local park. Detective Richard Pasta is on the case.

title: Jessie the Ghost
overview: A wanted cybercriminal lays low at the Jersey Shore.

title: Theoretical: The Invisible Man
overview: William is vlogging himself getting ready to go out for dinner with his family when he gets hit by something he can't see.

title: Maisie's Taste
overview: A lonely backpacker finds herself lost in the pitch black heart of rural New Zealand

title: Mousetrap
overview: Mousetrap follows the lives of 3 escaped inmates and the emotional turmoil that proceeds in the aftermath of their prison escape. The story delves into the psyche of several characters as they cope with the impact previous decisions had on their current situation.

title: Trap
overview: The plot of the film is built around two friends - novice car thiefs. Their names are Malek and Dyuos. Everything goes well for them, until one day Malek accidentally steals the car of a seasoned mafioso named Sakkai.  Now, before the next sunset, the guys must return the car to him and pay a large sum of money. Thus begins the dangerous adventures of friends in the criminal world, where the thirst for easy money is replaced by the only goal - to survive.

title: Unraveled: Mystery At The Mansion
overview: Billy Jensen and Alexis Linkletter unravel the 2009 shooting death of Diane Ward. Although two juries convicted her husband Bob Ward, there may be more to the story.

title: Malam
overview: Jay, a young man haunted by a murder committed back home in Malaysia, is sent to a housing block marked for demolition in Singapore. There, in this uncanny and at times surreal setting, he meets elusive and resilient Hannah, the only female member of a toxic 'family' of criminals. Jay's presence disrupts the fragile alliances between occultist boss Seow, sociopathic thug Alan and disillusioned henchman Patrick. Jay and Hannah plan their escape with Seow's money but find themselves caught in an endless night of seduction, deadly violence, and betrayal. And when the sun comes up, it won't be over. 'Malam' plunges into a humid, seething underworld of sexual jealousy, perverse power struggles and Southeast Asian folklore. It is a contemporary and atmospheric thriller about the chance for hope in a deeply corrupted world.

title: Forbidden Love
overview: Gang leader gets killed in prison before he dies he entrust the next gang leader to find his son and save him.

title: Johnny Galagher, Fading Virtues - Pilot (Part 2)
overview: Johnny Gallagher's morals are gone - his world has crumbled in on itself and the man who has remained is different.

title: Tuddy's Authentic Italian Ristorante
overview: When an Italian chef gains favour with known mafia boss, Don Remo, he must figure out how to make true Italian tomato sauce before his son's birthday.

title: Bergenring
overview: Maurice must settle his debts with his drug dealer Younes by ripping off another dealer  for him. But when the plan starts to go awry, the real test begins.
tagline: A world without laws is not a world without rules.

title: The Godfeline
overview: Aren't we all tired of The Godfather?? Has it held up at all??? Instead enjoy a less pretentious version starring an all feline cast. It doesn't just improve upon the original it puts Coppola to shame!
tagline: Sleeping with the fishes? These mobsters eat them down to the bone.

title: Hunt for the Pigeon Murderer
overview: There have been several murders and attacks against local students by a mysterious person in a pigeon mask. Presented by investigative journalist Samvu, who definitely isn’t the culprit.

title: Waiting for You to Come Home
overview: The film tells about the protagonist's experience of quitting drug addiction and reverting to the righteousness.

title: SATORI
overview: From Japanese: a moment of highest understanding; represents enlightenment in Zen Buddhism.

title: Detention
overview: Two friends get sent to detention for violating the school dress code, they attempt to escape their unfair emprisonment with the help of the other students trapped with them.

title: Death by Greed
overview: A man (Lachlan Mills),  seeks out his old friend, a Mafia boss (Lachlan Dunks), for help. Little does the Mafia boss know of his friend's devious intentions.

title: Take it Back
overview: "Take it Back" is a documentary that tells the story of Federico Petrozzino, a musician who discovers that the trunk of his car was looted and along with it, his belongings and his most precious treasure, a replica of Marty Mcfly's guitar from "Back to the Future". Thus, Federico turns into the protagonist of his own movie with only one possible plot: exhaust all resources to recover what is now in other hands.

title: Eviction
overview: Eviction is a crime thriller that follows three friends down on their luck: Jackie, Chris, and Kenny. After Kenny gets evicted, they decide to break in and rob their greedy landlord's house whilst he's abroad. Unfortunately for them, the landlord's son Erik is in the house with them. As both parties slowly start to realise they're not alone, a seemingly easy job quickly spirals out of control, testing their friendship, loyalty, and morality to the absolute limits.

title: The Cartel Project
overview: A documentary thriller recording a deadly dangerous investigation by international reporters to expose the impunity of drug lords and the complicity of political leaders in their crimes.

title: Deadline
overview: Kong is a screenwriter in crisis, who’s trying to meet a deadline. He is nervous, he has to get out of the current stalemate by hook or by crook. He tries but finds himself trapped in something new and unfamiliar.

title: Kissing Bug
overview: A cold and calculated killer stalks his prey through the night, but something’s off. Tonight he may lose his life or worse his mind....

title: Elwood Private Eyes
overview: A detective trying to solve a case falls victim to a time loop

title: Brumous
overview: Three detectives investigate a past scene of a murder, yet one has a hidden history of this place.

title: Three Shots
overview: A young man walks into a pub searching for answers about a missing friend, only to discover far more than he bargained for.
tagline: Truth comes at the bottom of a glass and the end of a gun.

title: Her Husband's Enemy
overview: Dreyaa, a Detroit suburbanite, gets involved with a street guy named Richard, who is biting off more than he can chew.
